name: sinorockco
short_description:
An anchor plate is a structural component used mainly in masonry buildings. These plates are connected to a rod or bolt and are typically visible on the outside of the building. The anchor plate distributes the tension created by its anchor point and stabilizes the connected wall. These plates are usually decorated or stylized, as they are visible on the outside of the building. In older buildings, these plates are made of cast or wrought iron and are usually made of steel in modern construction.
The anchor plate of Sinorock which includes flat plate and domed plate, which are made of steel. Both of them can suit self drilling anchor bar. The anchor plates are forged to a steel plate with a center hole allowing articulation of steel degree in all directions, and a thread structure inside. All functional parts are constantly tested, in line with Sinorock rigorous quality assurance policy.More information please click：http://www.sinorockco.com/product-details-172.html
